alert.note: Alert for Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 7:07AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL PINE, SOUTHWESTERN WASHBURN AND SOUTHERN BURNETT COUNTIES THROUGH 745 AM CDT... At 707 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rush City, to near Frederic, to near Cumberland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rock Creek, Shell Lake, Grantsburg, Trade Lake, Siren, Hertel, Branstad, Randall, Falun, Phantom Lake, Chengwatana State Forest, Four Corners, Trade River, and Alpha. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
